text: Suspect in Minnesota Shooting Linked to Security Company, Evangelical Ministry  —  The alleged shooter is a 57-year-old white male; according to his ministry's website, he “sought out militant Islamists in order to share the gospel and tell them that violence wasn't the answer.”

Rep. Melissa Hortman, her husband killed; Sen. John Hoffman, his wife shot in ‘targeted’ shootings  — Two Minnesota lawmakers and their spouses were shot by someone impersonating a police officer early Saturday morning.  — Rep. Melissa Hortman and her husband Mark were killed.

Here's how the attacks in Minnesota unfolded early on Saturday.  —  State Representative Melissa Hortman and her husband, Mark, died in the attack at their home.  The assailant also shot and injured another Democratic lawmaker and his wife, officials said.  —  “We're here today …
